name: Qingce Stir Fry
effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160-228 for 300s.
description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.
source: Purchase (Ms. Bai in Qingce Village, Liyue)
